text: Murder-Set-Pieces is a melodramatic horror movie of 2004. The movie has themes of lust, rape and cannibalism. This movie was given a limited release as an NC-17 (no children 17 or under). It was later released by Lions Gate Home Entertainment with an R rating. The United Kingdom banned the movie. title: Murder-Set-Pieces
